com.jackstockley.addressbookrest

Class AddressController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jackstockley.addressbookrest.AddressController

  • @Path(value="address")
public class AddressController
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages the RESTful side of the address object
    Author:
    jackstockley

      Constructor and Description
      AddressController() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      javax.ws.rs.core.Response getAllAddresses()
      Returns JSON for all the addresses in the database or status code 204 if no addresses in databse
      javax.ws.rs.core.Response getSimilarAddresses(java.lang.String field, java.lang.String data)
      Returns JSON for all the addresses in the database with similar field and data or status code 204 if no similar addresses
      javax.ws.rs.core.Response getSingularAddress(int id)
      Returns JSON for a singular address in the database or 204 if no address matches the id
      javax.ws.rs.core.Response insertAddress(Address address)
      Allows user to sumbit a PUT reuest to create a new address on the database
      javax.ws.rs.core.Response removeAddress(java.lang.String field, java.lang.String data)
      Allows user to submit a DELETE request to delete an address on the databse
      javax.ws.rs.core.Response updateAddress(int id, Address address)
      Allows user to sumbit a POST request to update an address on the database

    • Method Detail

      • getAllAddresses

        @GET
 @Produces(value="application/json")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response getAllAddresses()
        Returns JSON for all the addresses in the database or status code 204 if no addresses in databse
        Returns:
        Resposne with either 200, 204, or 500

      • getSimilarAddresses

        @GET
 @Produces(value="application/json")
 @Path(value="{field}/{data}")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response getSimilarAddresses(@PathParam(value="field")
                                                                                                                              java.lang.String field,
                                                                                                                              @PathParam(value="data")
                                                                                                                              java.lang.String data)
        Returns JSON for all the addresses in the database with similar field and data or status code 204 if no similar addresses
        Parameters:
        field - Field to match data with
        data - Similar data between addresses
        Returns:
        Response with either 200, 204, or 500

      • getSingularAddress

        @GET
 @Produces(value="application/json")
 @Path(value="{id}")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response getSingularAddress(@PathParam(value="id")
                                                                                                                   int id)
        Returns JSON for a singular address in the database or 204 if no address matches the id
        Parameters:
        id - ID of the address to be returned
        Returns:
        Response with either 200, 204, or 500

      • updateAddress

        @POST
 @Produces(value="application/json")
 @Consumes(value="application/json")
 @Path(value="update/{id}")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response updateAddress(@PathParam(value="id")
                                                                                                                                                           int id,
                                                                                                                                                           Address address)
        Allows user to sumbit a POST request to update an address on the database
        Parameters:
        id - ID of the address to be updated
        address - The new address that will replace the current address
        Returns:
        Response 200 and new address if updated otherwise 500

      • insertAddress

        @PUT
 @Produces(value="application/json")
 @Consumes(value="application/json")
 @Path(value="insert")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response insertAddress(Address address)
        Allows user to sumbit a PUT reuest to create a new address on the database
        Parameters:
        address - The new address to be added
        Returns:
        Response 200 and new address if added otherwise 500

      • removeAddress

        @DELETE
 @Produces(value="application/json")
 @Path(value="remove/{field}/{data}")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response removeAddress(@PathParam(value="field")
                                                                                                                                  java.lang.String field,
                                                                                                                                  @PathParam(value="data")
                                                                                                                                  java.lang.String data)
        Allows user to submit a DELETE request to delete an address on the databse
        Parameters:
        field - The field to match with the address
        data - Data of matchin field in address
        Returns:
        Response with JSON saying removed: true otherwise 500
